channel.title: The Hippie Scientist
channel.description: Independent research on psychoactive herbs, entheogens, and natural neurochemistry.

item.title: What Is a Psychoactive Herb?
item.description: Define psychoactive herbs, explore how plant compounds interact with human neurochemistry, and learn how to approach them responsibly.

item.title: How to Read Herbal Research
item.description: Step-by-step walkthrough for evaluating herbal research papers, understanding study design, and translating findings into safe practice.
